main event: A round, orange object the size of a baseball was observed traveling at high altitude in Buffalo, New York.
interesting points: The object was observed for 15 minutes before it faded out., The object traveled in a northwest direction., The witness described the object as resembling an ordinary star when viewed with the naked eye., Flames were observed emitting from the bottom of the object., The object was confirmed to be at high altitude, approximately 13,333 feet.
witness description: The witness observed the object while returning home from work.
